scripts.pack:package: npm run build:lib && npm pack --pack-destination dist
scripts.pack:ng: npm run build:ng && npm pack --pack-destination dist
scripts.example:decode-favicon: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const b=fs.readFileSync('example/favicon.ico.base64','utf8').replace(/\n/g,''); fs.writeFileSync('example/favicon.ico', Buffer.from(b,'base64')); console.log('example/favicon.ico written')"
scripts.example:dev: npm run example:decode-favicon && npx esbuild example/main.ts --bundle --outfile=example/main.js --format=esm && npm run example:serve
